Rockhounding狩猎岩石 
简介此 Mod 主要的物品 用于装饰 （作者花了大量时间物品制作上），同时加强了 洞穴挖掘体验 与 资源供给方式 使游戏更具探索的味道。
此 Mod 向游戏中添加了多种 岩石 与 彩色大理石，玩家可以以此为基础制成 装饰、建筑材料 ，同时 Mod 为一些矿石添加了 额外的拓展 ，这些拓展包含了 化学、宝石学、冶金等方面 的一些 功能特性 或 用途。另外 Mod 添加了一些独立的机器，玩家能依靠它们来 制造、加工 ，从而获得一些 新的工具 或 物品 。
以上的一切，作者都是基于现实来设计的。

Change Log

2.23
ID saving plan
-Each building part (slabs, plates, columns...) can be disabled if not needed (better before the world creation). The Cutting Station and the Brick Carver won't perform those cuts.
-Modular slabs can be also replaced via config by simple half slabs.
-Rearranged several items.
Modular Glass Panes (see Glass Blocks Spoiler)
-Revised the Modular Pane concept. 15 positions through 3 axis. 
-Placeable depending on the hitbox and eventually switchable with wrench. Right-click to scroll positions, sneaking+rightclick to rotate the block (if sneaking is not recognized it works with the RIGHT SHIFT key as well until fixed).
-Glass, Stained Glass and Fluorescent Glass Modular Panes available. Reversible recipes with normal panes.
-The outer shapes can auto-extend to create corners.
-The feature can be enabled/disabled as well
Ore Gen Fixes
-Coal Tiers, Bonus Ores, Fluorite and Beryl ores can be affected by Fortune enchantment on mining.
-Tweaked some spawning settings.
Misc fixes/additions
-Updated recipes for Milkstone crafting (see Crafted Blocks Page)
-Added a procedure for foodSalt making. Added the Evaporation Tank (see chemistry Page)
-Rearranged some recipes. All building parts moved inside the Cutting Station.
-Mob Fences can be crafted with the 1.8 recipe via config.
-Reworked the config file
